- What documentation is added/updated/removed?
- Audience and purpose (users, developers, operators)

## Scope
- Files/sections/pages affected
- Out of scope (if any)

## Rationale
- Why this change is needed now
- Sources (decisions, ADRs, issues)

## Accuracy & Consistency
- Version/branch applicability
- Alignment with current behavior and APIs

## Review Notes
- Key areas to focus on
- Terminology or diagrams updated

- Links/screenshots of rendered docs (if applicable)
- Commands to build/view docs locally
